knimeNode.shortDescription: Retrieves some annotation using a Distributed Annotation Server.

fullDescription.intro:
Retrieves some annotation using a Distributed Annotation Server (DAS).
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option:
DAS DNA URL for Features. example for UCSC hg19:
http://genome.ucsc.edu/cgi-bin/das/hg19/features?segment=__POSITION__;type=knownGene
The word __POSITION__ will be replaced by the coordinate in the row
Maximum number of DAS record per row.
